alert.note: Alert for North Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 4:26PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Geneva and northwestern Walton Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 326 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Florala to 8 miles east of Crestview. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... De Funiak Springs, Eglin Air Force Base, Liberty, Paxton, Gordon, Pond Creek, Oakwood Hills, Cluster Springs, Fox Hill, Gaskin, Sand Hill, Alpine Heights, Darlington, De Funiak Spring Airport, Glendale, Lakewood, Center Ridge, Flowersville, New Harmony and Piney Grove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
